text: @realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs Lou Dobbs is a suck ass. And who does this? 101,000 dead Americans from a novel Coronavirus ON YOUR WATCH and you're thanking somebody for praising YOU? Narsacistic, sick fu*k. You're losing everybody except your cult, that = #Biden2020
